name: Shiro Neko CTO
description: Shiro Neko CTO is a community driven project aiming to honor the legacy of Shiro Neko, the worldâ€™s most relaxed cat. Unfortunately Shiro Neko passed away in 2020 but not before leaving his mark on the world, uniting people across the internet in common love for his humorous antics and meme worthy photos. Shiro Neko CTO is the first Shiro Neko token deployed on the Ethereum blockchain and consequently carries significant provenance.
